feature.label: Semantic Assistants Eclipse Plug-in
feature.description: The Semantic Assistants Eclipse plug-in provides an integration of the Eclipse development environment into the Semantic Assistants architecture. It provides a user interface for offering various Natural Language Processing services to users.
feature.copyright: This plug-in is part of the Semantic Assistants architecture. Copyright (C) 2009 - 2011 Semantic Software Lab, http://www.semanticsoftware.info
